items.name: init(avAudioNode: AVAudioNode?)
items.desc: Initializes an audio node from an AVFoundation audio node.

items.name: init(fileNamed: String)
items.desc: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified filename.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified URL.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Tells you when to initialize an audio node that has been unarchived.

items.name: var avAudioNode: AVAudioNode?
items.desc: The audio node’s current audio asset.

items.name: var isPositional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean property that indicates whether the node’s audio is altered based on the position of the node.

items.name: var autoplayLooped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio should play in a loop when the node is added to the scene.
